title: Multimedia Resource Organization Design for Customized eLearning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Context-based learning content is required to strengthen the connection to real-world tasks for in-service practitioners. A metadata system must be developed for personalized resource recommendations

learning_goals: Learners can classify science-specific multimedia resources with 80% accuracy
Learners can selectively utilize four or more types of multimedia (video, simulation, infographic, audio) in mobile environments based on situational needs
Learners can explain resource packaging principles based on SCORM/IMS standards and apply them to real-world cases
Learners can design a multimedia resource recommendation system based on learner profiles (job role, experience, learning style)

resources: Open Educational Resources (OER) Database for Science

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
